title: Amarillo Ceviche Mixto
directions: Place all the sauce ingredients in a blender or food processor and purée until smooth. In a nonreactive bowl, mix together the sauce, shrimp, octopus, scallops, tomato, bell pepper, chives, and green onions. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. Before serving, garnish with the chopped cilantro.
ingredients: 1/2 pound shrimp, peeled, deveined, and blanched
1/2 pound octopus, cooked and sliced crosswise into 1/8-inch slices
1 small yellow bell pepper, seeded and diced
1 tablespoon coarsely chopped fresh cilantro for garnish
